column3: <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, ever a sight for sore eyes! What brings you here this day? Are you come to see our progress, or perhaps to contribute to it?

In any case, I owe you a debt of gratitude. Thanks to able and willing helpers such as your good self, the reconstruction effort proceeds apace. This court has fairly been reborn, I believe you will agree.
Oi, Francel. I've finished my checks, and everything looks to be order. That's that for the court, I reckon.
Glad am I to hear it. This is a momentous step in our project─one we could not have taken without the aid of Ishgardians and outsiders alike.
Aye. At last, we've got a flow of materials comin' in, along with the hands to put it all to use. It begins in earnest.
That it does, my friend. That it does.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, Augebert. There is something I would ask of you.
I bid you commit to your mind's eye the Firmament as it is now.
When the last paving stone is laid, I would have you fully appreciate how much has been accomplished by the sweat of innumerable brows.
For though Ishgard may arrive at a brighter future, we must never forget the path we walked to get there, fraught with sorrow and sacrifice as it was.
If we do so, I fear we will lose our way again.
Heh, same old Francel, though, eh? Try to unclench that jaw of yours a little, lad, else you're liable to give yourself a fever and collapse like you used to.
Those days are long past, thank you very much!
<sigh> Just...remember what I asked. And pray keep it private. 'Tis a personal request to the two of you.
Don't worry, you know I ain't no gossipmonger. Now then, if there's nothing else, I'll get back to it.
All right, my friend. Take care you do not overwork yourself, and tell the others the same.

Well, there you have it, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. There will be a brief hiatus while we prepare for the next phase of construction. When all is in readiness, I shall make another announcement.
In the meantime, do rest and recover your strength. 'Twas good to see you again.
